short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Inscribe and store your inscriptions in the world's first Open Source Chrome wallet for Ordinals!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
SatProof Wallet is a browser extension wallet that allows users to securely store, send, and receive bitcoin and ordinals assets on the Bitcoin network. The extension is designed to be user-friendly and easy to use, even for users who are new to the world of cryptocurrencies.

New version support BRC-20 and ORC-20 ordinals assets.

With SatProof Wallet, you can store and transfer your inscriptions, see unconfirmed inscriptions immediately, and even inscribe (mint) on-the-fly without running a full node. Additionally, you can store and transfer your BRC-20 / ORC-20 or stamp SRC-20 with ease.

One of the most important features of SatProof Wallet is that it is a non-custodial wallet. This means that we never have access to your funds, and we never store your seed phrase, password, or any private information. Your accounts are derived from your Secret Recovery Phrase, which is encrypted on your device by your password.

SatProof Wallet is also 100% open source, which means that anyone can review our code and ensure that it is secure and trustworthy. We are committed to providing our users with the highest level of security and transparency.

Some of the other features of SatProof Wallet include:

- Open Source
- Support BRC-20 and ORC-20 Token
- Hierarchical deterministic wallet
- Encrypted private keys that are never shared with anyone
- No tracking of personal identifiable information, account addresses, or asset balances
- Ability to import accounts from single private keys
- Supports displaying and transferring inscriptions
- Will support the Lightning Network in future versions
